alert.note: Alert for Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Perry and north central Stone Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Wiggins, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Augusta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
